faqs.question: How do I track my clicks and earnings?
faqs.answer: Once approved, you'll gain access to our dedicated affiliate dashboard where you can track clicks, conversions, sales, and commissions in real-time. The dashboard provides comprehensive analytics to help you optimize your promotional efforts.

faqs.question: When and how do I get paid?
faqs.answer: Payments are processed monthly via PayPal or US bank transfer. The minimum payout threshold is $50-$100. You'll receive detailed payment reports and can track your earnings through the affiliate dashboard.

faqs.question: Can I get free products for review?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a Free Sample Program for qualifying affiliates. Applications are evaluated based on audience size, content quality, and relevance to our brand. This program allows you to experience our products firsthand before promoting them.

faqs.question: Are there specific content guidelines I need to follow?
faqs.answer: Yes, we require high-quality, relevant content focused on vinyl, audio equipment, or music lifestyle. Most importantly, you MUST include clear FTC disclosure in ALL promotional content indicating your material connection to XenonJade.

faqs.question: What kind of marketing materials are available?
faqs.answer: Our affiliate resource library includes product images, logos, banners, product descriptions, and suggested promotional copy. All materials are professionally designed and optimized for various platforms and formats.

faqs.question: Who can I contact for support?
faqs.answer: For all affiliate program questions, support, and assistance, please contact our dedicated affiliate team at affiliates@xenonjade.com. We're committed to helping our partners succeed.

faqs.question: What is the commission structure?
faqs.answer: We offer a competitive 8-15% base commission rate on eligible sales, with opportunities for increased rates based on performance milestones. Our cookie duration is 30+ days, and we offer performance bonuses for top affiliates.

faqs.question: Do I need to be based in the US to apply?
faqs.answer: While we welcome affiliates globally, our primary focus is on US-based influencers with significant US audience reach. This helps ensure the best conversion rates and audience alignment with our target market.

faqs.question: How long does the application process take?
faqs.answer: Applications are typically reviewed within 3-5 business days. We evaluate each application based on audience relevance, content quality, engagement metrics, and brand fit to ensure mutually beneficial partnerships.

faqs.question: Can I promote XenonJade products on multiple platforms?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can promote our products across all your platforms including social media, blogs, YouTube, podcasts, and websites. We provide platform-specific marketing materials to help optimize your promotions.
